sentences.sContent: Overall they experienced the same stress-reducing effects of the brisk walkers. Better yet, the effects were evident immediately.
sentences.sContent_eng: Overall they experienced the same stress-reducing effects of the brisk walkers. Better yet, the effects were evident immediately.
sentences.sCn: 总的来说他们与轻快步行的那组压力减轻的程度是相同的，但前者的见效更快。

sentences.sContent: People who are new to wellness usually are introduced to one part of this triangle such as exercise, diet or stress-reducing practices (meditation).
sentences.sContent_eng: People who are new to wellness usually are introduced to one part of this triangle such as exercise, diet or stress-reducing practices (meditation).
sentences.sCn: 刚刚接受健康教育的人们通常是先接触“健康三角”的一个方面，比如：锻炼身体，调节饮食，或者练习减压（默想）。
